headline: Trump threatens ABC: Why telecom sector faces a 'bigger threat'
summary: President Trump has threatened to sue Disney-owned (DIS) ABC following comments from Jimmy Kimmel after his late-night show was reinstated after a brief suspension that sparked free speech debates. Pangaea Policy founder Terry Haines outlines the business impact of Trump's threats for broadcasters and telecommunication providers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is included among the Best Retirement Stocks for a Dividend Stock Portfolio. Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ), a leading US wireless and broadband provider, has regained attention from income-focused investors following another annual dividend hike and a stable outlook for 2025. headline: VoIP-Pal Has Filed and Served Amended Antitrust Complaints Against Apple, Google, and Samsung
summary: The Company now has four active antitrust lawsuits spanning six tech and telecom giants, alleging Wi-Fi Calling is unlawfully tied to cellular bundles.WACO, Texas, Sept. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- VoIP-Pal.com Inc. (OTCQB: VPLM) announced it has filed and served two amended antitrust lawsuits—one individual and one nationwide class action—against Apple, Google, and Samsung. These filings expand the Company’s litigation portfolio to four active cases, joining earlier actions against AT&T, Veriz

headline: Verizon brings innovation to Smith Island, connecting one of America's most secluded communities
summary: With ingenuity and grit, Verizon's award-winning network and engineers deliver high-speed internet to Chesapeake Bay's Smith IslandSMITH ISLAND, Md., Sept. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon's award-winning network has reached one of America's most secluded communities, bringing high-speed internet and mobile service to Smith Island, Maryland, for the very first time.
